name: The Bistro: Ryouri & Wine no Shokunin-tachi
overview: The Bistro: Ryouri & Wine no Shokunin-tachi is a simulation game in which the player can own his own bistro restaurant hiring the different staff members, selecting the foods and drinks, etc. The goal of the game is to have the best restaurant of the city. The game features 3 main countries to choose (Japanese, Italian & French) over 230 different wine kinds and a complete encyclopedia of meals and drinks.
